title: Development of movement themes in the gymnasium
creator_credit: Swift Film Productions and Margaret Rosewarne
brief_description: Students demonstrate the basic movements used in comparatively advanced educational gymnastics. In four parts - balance, elevation, use of apparatus, and advanced examples. Aims to encourage inventiveness and resourcefulness, and illustrates body tension, transition, and group rhythms.
